CHAT.comment: This file is the second of a series of two (18a and 18b) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: looking at the card game in front of her .
turning a card towards me and pointing at it .
showing a pink character from her book to me .
talking to the children in the classroom next door .
putting the last card in front of Eliza .
the assistant is talking to the children in the classroom next door .
Nina takes a card from the box .
Nina gives the card to Lucille and sits down again .
Nina gives the card to Eliza .
talking to a child in the room next door .
shaking her finger in the air and then pointing at her card .
Eliza gives the card to Lucille .
both Lucille and Eliza put their hand up .
showing the card to the other girls .
she has found the same picture on Eliza's card .
